column5: Serene and Clean Apartment in the Center of the City.  Be in a place 20 mins away from anywhere in the City and live in the Uptown part of the City.  The Galleria is 5 mins away, Edwards Cinema is also 5 mins away and all of the Major Highways are less than 5 mins away as well.  Apartment is well furnished with comfortable furniture, clean bathrooms, large windows for light and great ventilation as well. Wifi internet is available always.  Pool and Gym are available to use by guests.
